briefTitle: Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Immunogenicity of an Adjuvanted Influenza Vaccine Among HCP
officialTitle: Randomized Controlled Trial, Double Blind, Phase III, to Evaluate the Immunogenicity of an Adjuvanted Influenza Vaccine Among Health Care Personnel (EDUCATE)

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

primary.measure: Hemagglutination Inhibition (HI) Geometric Mean Titers (GMT) Post-vaccination (Day 28) of Each Vaccine Reference Virus
primary.description: The geometric mean of antibody titers after a single dose of FLUAD Quadrivalent (adjuvanted dose, AD) vs. FluQuadri (standard dose, SD) as measured by HI assay for egg-grown influenza A(H1N1)pdm09, A(H3N2), B/Yamagata, and B/Victoria vaccine reference viruses at approximately 28 days post-vaccination

primary.measure: HI GMT Post-vaccination (6 Months) of Each Vaccine Reference Virus
primary.description: The geometric mean of antibody titers after a single dose of AD vs SD vaccine as measured by HI assay for egg-grown influenza A(H1N1)pdm09, A(H3N2), B/Yamagata, and B/Victoria vaccine reference viruses at approximately 6 months post-vaccination

primary.measure: Seroconversion Rate (SCR) to Each Vaccine Reference Virus Post-vaccination
primary.description: The percent of participants with paired samples that achieved ≥4-fold rises comparing post- (approximately 28 days) versus pre-vaccination titers, and post-vaccination titers ≥40 for each vaccine reference virus (egg-grown influenza A(H1N1)pdm09, A(H3N2), B/Yamagata, and B/Victoria vaccine reference viruses) following a single dose of AD vs. SD vaccine.

primary.measure: SCR to Each Vaccine Reference Virus Post-vaccination
primary.description: The percent of participants with paired samples that achieved ≥4-fold rises comparing post- (approximately 6 months) versus pre-vaccination titers, and post-vaccination titers ≥40 for each vaccine reference virus (egg-grown influenza A(H1N1)pdm09, A(H3N2), B/Yamagata, and B/Victoria vaccine reference viruses) following a single dose of AD vs. SD vaccine.

primary.measure: Seroprotection Rate (SPR) to Each Vaccine Reference Virus Post-vaccination
primary.description: The percent of participants with post-vaccination titers ≥40 for each vaccine reference virus (egg-grown influenza A(H1N1)pdm09, A(H3N2), B/Yamagata, and B/Victoria vaccine reference viruses) following a single dose of AD vs. SD vaccine.

primary.measure: SPR to Each Vaccine Reference Virus Post-vaccination
primary.description: The percent of participants with post-vaccination titers ≥40 for each vaccine reference virus (egg-grown influenza A(H1N1)pdm09, A(H3N2), B/Yamagata, and B/Victoria vaccine reference viruses) following a single dose of AD vs. SD vaccine.
